articles.title: Allison Koh
articles.contents: I am a PhD Candidate at the Berlin Graduate School for Global and Transregional Studies and the Hertie School Centre for International Security. In my dissertation research, I investigate how ICTs (in particular, social media) factor into regimesâ€™ strategies for engaging in state-sanctioned violence. I am also a Research Associate at the Hertie School Data Science Lab and the SCRIPTS Data and Methodology Center. In this role, I develop training materials for data science workshops and consult on statistical computing for graduate students and researchers.

articles.title: Projects
articles.description: If you are interested in hiring me for a project, please [contact me](mailto:koh@hertie-school.org).
